attributes.action: not have us spied on in all our social networking sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day something changes that affect our rights. Whether this is stopping us from Smoking, playing computer games, buying chocolate bars etc etc. Now we are told that all details of our social networking is to be logged.

This is true invasion of Privacy and should NOT be allowed!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
